content: Developers can build their own Model Context Protocol (MCP) server using the Agent Development Kit (ADK) to make any ADK tool discoverable.
Building an MCP server with ADK involves understanding core components such as the `mcp` library and server handlers.
Three distinct use cases for building MCP servers include: a simple API MCP server, a database MCP server using the MCP Toolbox, and custom MCP servers for advanced scenarios.
Building MCP servers helps transition isolated agents into a truly interconnected AI ecosystem.
